5132198950738050.original: AI革命初见端倪。deepseek深度思考+联网，可以让大部分人对事物的认知上升一个层级。如果有人问我怎么样能尽快提升自己，我的答案是，去学会用DeepSeek。

5132789607301135.original:
小红书开源了其最新语音识别模型：FireRedASR，擅长识别中英文、方言/歌词，在公共普通话ASR基准测试中达到了新的最佳水平

两种架构设计，LLM版，8.3B参数，高识别准确率，支持无缝的端到端语音交互，适合高质量语音转写

AED版， 1.1B参数，可以平衡性能和效率，适合普通应用场景

github： ...全文
5132789607301135.processed:
Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test.

There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription.

AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios.

github: ... github： ...
5132789607301135.refined_with_url: Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test. There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription. AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios. GitHub: /status/5132789607301135

5132449099808896.original:
一个用于构建支持RAG的AI聊天助手React组件：rag-chat-component，可以在Next.js应用中快速添加智能聊天助手

支持流式响应、服务器端操作、响应式设计
支持实时上下文检索、保存聊天记录
可定制UI组件

github：网页链接

#ai创造营##AI智能助手##RAG##ragchatcomponent#
5132449099808896.processed:
A React component for building AI chat assistants with RAG support: rag-chat-component, which can quickly add an intelligent chat assistant to Next.js applications.

Supports streaming responses, server-side operations, and responsive design.
Supports real-time context retrieval and chat log saving.
Customizable UI component.

GitHub: 
u=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fupstash%2Frag-chat-component
5132449099808896.refined_with_url:
A React component for building AI chat assistants with RAG support: rag-chat-component, which can quickly add an intelligent chat assistant to Next.js applications.

Supports streaming responses, server-side operations, and responsive design. Supports real-time context retrieval, chat log saving, and customizable UI components.

GitHub: https://github.com/upstash/rag-chat-component
